main event: Mrs. E. Cinti reported seeing a single slow-moving light in the sky, followed by a streak of smoke and a brighter light near Cincinnati Airport on 28 January 1967.
interesting points: Mrs. Cinti first observed the light about a week prior and was certain it was not an airplane,The sighting lasted for about 5-10 minutes,The air raid sirens went off during the observation,The light appeared to land near Cincinnati Airport,The report was documented by the Air Force but deemed insufficient for scientific evaluation.
witness description: Mrs. E. Cinti, a reliable citizen who contacted the Air Force regarding her sighting.
